title: Manual calibration fallback (click points) with persisted artifact
scope: Provide a minimal manual fallback for calibration when auto-fit fails (click correspondences).
Persist a reusable calibration artifact per venue/camera.
Validate inputs strictly and emit clear errors.
acceptance: A manual correspondences format is accepted and validated.
Calibration succeeds deterministically when correspondences are valid.
Artifact can be reused for future runs with the same static camera.

deliverables.title: Manual calibration flow and validator
acceptance: Manual correspondences are validated and produce a deterministic calibration output.
Errors are actionable (missing points, out-of-bounds, wrong schema_version).

subtasks.title: Implement manual correspondences validation and calibration output.
done_when: manual.py accepts correspondences and emits calibration results deterministically.
inputs.py validates schema and correspondence bounds.
